eyes place them now i put mine between row 11 12 opposite the seam stuff head firmly using polyfil set aside ears make 2 instruction stitches *using skin tone 4 chain 2 4 single_crochet in second chain from hook this works better if you use the magic circle mentioned in the notes on page 2 that way you can really tighten up the circle and make them look more ear-like do not join to the first stitch cut the yarn pull it tight and use both tails to sew the ear to the head as shown in the pictures below page 3 of 7 designed by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush
